Package com.example.client

Class ClientController

java.lang.Object
com.example.client.ClientController
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class ClientController extends Object implements Runnable
Controller that is responsible to obtain root nodes of current window, updates UI, creates a client socket to connect to the server, sends messages to and receives messages from the server.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Soham
See Also:

    Field
    Description
    private String
    clientName
    Name of the user that has logged in.

    input

    output
    Used to send data to the server.

    Instance of client socket.
    private javafx.scene.control.TextArea
    tfClientInput
    TextArea node on the current window used to allow users to type messages inside a text area on client window.
    private javafx.scene.control.TextArea
    tfMessageArea
    TextArea node on the current window used to show server replied messages to user on server window.

      public void displayMessages()
      Displays messages to the UI window, sends messages to the server and spawns a new thread which performs the task of receiving messages from the server.
